content: निरोधः निरोधनं {@--1@} Confinement, locking up, imprisonment; <ls>Ms. 8. 310</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 8.">375.</ls> {@--2@} Enclosing, covering up; <ls>Amaru. 87.</ls> {@--3@} Restraint, check, suppression, control; योगश्चित्तवृत्तिनिरोधः <ls>Yoga S.</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 48.</ls> {@--4@} Hindrance, obstruction, opposition. {@--5@} Hurting, punishing, injuring. {@--6@} Annihilation, complete destruction. {@--7@} Aversion, dislike. {@--8@} Disappointment, frustration of hopes (in dramatic language). {@--9@} (With the Buddhists) Suppression of pain.
